attributes.action: Make it illegal for Newspapers to make fake story's to discredit actual issues.
attributes.additional_details: There is hundreds and thousands of fake articles written and published on social media everyday. The right and the left have been using this as a political tool to target naive and unaware voters. These kind of dirty tactics distract people from real issues which need to be addressed! I think if these fake story's were to be banned then we could have a honest debate on social media about real issues which actually effect people.
attributes.background: Fake stories from the likes of The Daily Mail, The Sun and many more are deliberately sowing disinformation to discredit movements campaigning for gender equality or smearing non-Christian communities. They use social media to conquer and divide what is already a divided nation.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

It is already possible to complain about the accuracy of a story to the Independent Press Standards Organisation. You can find out more about their work here:

https://www.ipso.co.uk/

You could start a new petition setting out clearly how you would like the law to change.
